To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

::The Cybertronian Fire/Rex/Kluster/Striker/Ramulus/Smokescreen::

Ares' shots hit the shields of the Cybertronian Fire, this time regestering 
on the energy readings, but not nearly enough to even cause the shields to 
falter. A missile launcher takes aim at Ares, firing two signature-seeking 
missiles.

The laser batteries swirl around to fire at Hades and Ares, the EMP cannons, 
once again recharged, firing at Anubis.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rex laughs as he sees Hell Beast retreat. He runs after the Predacon 
commander for a while.

"And don't come back, coward!" Rex yells loudly enough for Hell Beast to 
hear, then turns around to return to the ship.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster looks from the running Predacons to his ship, leaughing 
good-heartedly as he fires at Koga.

"Ha!" he says into his comm-link, sending the message to all Maximals and 
Predacons, "Three attacks and they couldn't even scratch the ship!"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker smiles as he sees the Predacons run.

"Good battle, eh, Hell Beast?" he says into his comm, sending the 
transmission to the Predacon commander, "Too bad you couldn't stay longer."

With that, he turns to fire at Ares.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Maximal victory!" Ramulus yells as he sees Hell Beast retreat. He smiles, 
turning to fire at Anubis.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Smokescreen's eyes widen as he sees Hell Beast and the Preds run. Another 
Maximal victory! He turns around to walk toward the ship. He was pretty 
damaged, so he headed toward the CR chambers.
